data.explanation: Rarely takes cover and focuses solely on attacking the nearest enemy.
Always attacks from behind Cover.
Will use Cover and fight with various tactics.
Will charge forward but will also flank.
Able to move long distances. Unable to climb over cover or onto high ground due to its short stature. Also unable to attack enemies from behind Cover.
Self-destructs when destroyed, dealing damage to units within a certain range.
Deals AoE damage to enemy units within the specified area and ignores Cover.
Able to heal allies.
Creates tiles with varying effects.
Charges straight toward a target, ignoring low Cover and allies.
Locks onto a target and attacks it on the next turn.
Elite units often possess additional skills in addition to their normal attack.
Unaffected by control effects like Stun, Taunt, Command Prohibition, or Frigid.
Cannot take Cover due to its large size.
Counterattacks enemies that attack it.
Immediately launches an assist attack when a unit within range is attacked.
Will make allied units lose some mobility.
Able to apply a Taunt effect on enemy units.
Able to summon different support units.
Inflicts AoE damage, which can be split across multiple targets.
Cannot be targeted in certain situations.
Triggers an immediate attack when an enemy target tries to move within the specified area.
Deals additional damage to the target when specific conditions are met.
A counterattack is triggered if an enemy unit attempts to attack within the specified area.
Becomes an ally when Stability is broken.
Becomes immobilized when Stability is broken.
Will provide shields to allies.
Attacks bypass Low-Cover protection, but the unit is also unable to benefit from Low-Cover protection.
Able to provide Stability protection to allies.
Performs an attack if an enemy unit takes any action within the specified area.
Grants buffs to all allies.
Able to switch between different combat stances.
Exposes enemy units.
Will prioritize enemies with specific status effects.
The greater the distance, the more powerful the attack.
Treasures will drop when hit!
Will draw enemies towards themselves.
Grants buffs to allies on the battlefield.
Grants buffs to allies within the specified area.
Grants buffs when they are near specific allies.
Has a short range, but has considerable firepower.
Has a large amount of HP.
Effective in Combat Exercise.
Performs an immediate counterattack when an enemy target attempts to attack or use a skill within the specified area.
A counterattack is triggered when an ally within the specified area is attacked.
Cracks open and unleashes the monster(s) within at the start of the turn.
When hit by crowd control effects such as Stun, Taunt, Command Prohibition, or Frigid, they will be immune to them for the next 3 turns.
A tactical assault vehicle operated by the Commander. Allows the Commander to fight alongside Dolls, no matter where they are.
